name: Application Date
title: APP
definition: Identifies the date that the customer gives the provider an Access Service Request with sufficient information to allow a service order to be issued.

validEntry.description: Two Digit Month (01-12) Two Digit Century (00-99)
Two Digit Day (01-31) Two Digit Year (00-99)
Two Digit Century (00-99) Two Digit Month (01-12)
Two Digit Year (00-99) Two Digit Day (01-31)

usageNotes: Prohibited when the RT field is “B” or “S”.
Optional when the RT field is “F” and the second position of the TQ field on the ASR Form is “N” or “X”.
